content: the f bomb i made this for my teen after seeing his frustration with not being able to use certain words around his younger brother… and not being able to find a knit version - i found several crochet options but nothing for knitters it s a cute humorous way to be able to poke fun at your favorite friend who has some issues with watching their language for this pattern you ll need to know how to use double pointed needles how to chain stitches/slip stitches using a crochet hook and either know how to duplicate stitch or be willing to learn donna druchunas has my favorite duplicate stitch tutorial which you can find here https //www youtube com/watch v=leu-k6tzadw materials ● size us 6 dpns 4 0mm ● size g/4 25mm crochet hook ● worsted weight ○ -black/charcoal/dark grey ○ -red just a few yards ○ -cream/tan just a few yards ● polyfill the pattern co 8 - divide onto 4 dpns r1 - kfb in each - 16 r2 - knit every alternating round r3 - k1 kfb repeat around - 24 r5 - k2 kfb repeat around - 32 r7 - k3 kfb repeat around - 40 r9 - k4 kfb repeat around - 48 r11 - k4 kfb repeat around - 56 r12 - 21 k 9 rounds **begin decreases** r22 - k5 k2tog r23 - knit every alternating round r24 - k4 k2tog r26 - k3 k2tog r28 - k2 k2tog *stuff here* r30 - k2tog around knit for 5 or 6 rounds this will make the top nubby part of the bomb cut yarn leaving a long tail thread needle with tail and slide live stitches onto needle/tail and pull tight finishing off and bury end in the ball trim end finishing using crochet hook pull a loop of cream yarn through the top of the bomb chain 12 and slip_stitch back along the chain back to the bomb finish off and bury end in the bomb add orange and yellow pieces if you want a lit fuse to make the f you re going to make two row of vertical duplicate stitch - 12 stitches each next you ll make two row of duplicate stitch horizontally for the top of the f each row being 5 stitches - for a total of 7 across the top then you ll do a single row 4 stitches for the middle bar of the f - total of 6 stitches
